title: 服务器pe坐标插件
txt_content: 我的世界服务器pe坐标插件是啥？

replies.author: phj233
replies.txt_content: /gamerule showcoordinates true在需要开坐标的世界输入这个指令，所有玩家都看得见

replies.author: xmdhs
replies.txt_content: https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=794901

xmdhs 发表于 2020-3-10 20:45
https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=794901
还需要登录，我没那个账号，可以打我下发

replies.txt_content:

replies.author: Nyan-Cat
replies.txt_content:
/gamerule showcoordinates true
这个指令直接打开
